variants.Description in input context: c.543G>A (p.G181D) associated with impaired DNA repair.

Material used.Description: The experiment used breast cancer tissue samples from 10 patients.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_007294.3:c.543G>A showed 70% reduction in DNA repair activity.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type BRCA1-expressing cells were used as controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells with no BRCA1 expression were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was performed to compare groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: DNA repair activity â‰¥ 85% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: DNA repair activity < 50% of wild-type levels.
